project.name: WhiteCrane
project.description: WhiteCrane is a CMS(Content Management System) designed for anything from personal websites to corporate documentation respiratory. WhiteCrane not only allows you to update your sites pages but also allows you create and delete them with ease, and thanks to our custom built syntax parser any functions added are rendered in 100% valid xhtml. While the simplicity makes it ideal for personal websites it can also be used on a corporate level thanks to the use of simple yet effective authentication system were unless the user is already logged in, none of the file system can be modified.
